channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Goldfinger
channel.desc: Iconic Bond film starring Sean Connery and Honor Blackman, 1964. 007 uncovers a plot to contaminate the gold reserve at Fort Knox while investigating a decadent gold smuggler.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as actress Su Pollard, dancer Jordan Banjo, TV presenter AJ Odudu and TV legend Jonathan Ross take on the challenge to win thousands for their chosen charities. S11 Ep3.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
channel.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a celebrity special of the classic game show with Charlie Hedges, Luke Kempner, and Jeremy Vine all trying to guess well-known phrases from animated clues.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: It'll Be Alright on the Night
channel.desc: David Walliams celebrates the funniest behind-the-scenes bloopers and live broadcast blunders from shows including Strictly Come Dancing, Blankety Blank, and Coronation Street.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Code of Silence
channel.desc: Suspenseful crime drama. Alison discovers Liam's betrayal and races to stop the gang's heist - chaos erupts as lives are endangered and Alison is forced to confront the fallout. S1 Ep5.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world.
